title: Streamline Development Task Display
description: Remove Branch information, PR status messaging, and Rebase functionality from Development Task interface to create a simplified, distraction-free user experience.
iWant: a streamlined Development Task display without Branch, PR status, and Rebase elements
soThat: I can concentrate on essential task information without interface clutter
acceptanceCriteria: Branch information is removed from Development Task interface
PR created and ready for development status is hidden from view
Rebase link is eliminated from task action options
Task display maintains consistent spacing after element removal
